snippet: The Tunisian soldiers were killed by a land mine during an operation against Islamist militants in the north of the country, the state news agency TAP reported.
abstract: Tunisian state news agency TAP reports four Tunisian soldiers killed by a land mine during an operation against Islamist militants in the Chaambi mountains in the north of the country.
lead_paragraph: The Tunisian soldiers were killed by a land mine during an operation against Islamist militants in the north of the country, the state news agency TAP reported.

headline.main: Tunisia: Four Soldiers Are Killed in Operation Against Militants
headline.print_headline: Tunisia: Four Soldiers Are Killed in Operation Against Militants
